work.description: RevaComm is an enterprise digital transformation company providing consulting, design, and software engineering services. It specializes in DevSecOps, agile web and software development, staff augmentation, cloud hosting and support, and cybersecurity assessment. The company serves government, defense, and corporate markets.
highlights: Be responsible for managing software products and lead IT execution and delivery
Engage with the customer and project teams daily to ensure both groups are happy
Be the customer point-of-contact for issues and outcomes
Oversee technical team efforts to ensure alignment with stakeholder objectives
Track project cost, schedule, and resource performance aligned with project scope
Manage team workload and outcomes
Be the facilitator to remove any team blockers
Engage with key stakeholders as necessary to align technical tasks as appropriate
Be required to have and maintain the insights into the project and team as to when they are blocked
Manage iteration planning meetings, sprints, backlogs, and roadmap
Assist managers/training team members with training and occasionally posting updates to support their online communities or interest groups
Provide support for outreach events outside program to grow RevaComm
Responsible for follow-up and customer satisfaction surveys/NPS
Provide weekly updates on actions/progress taken during the week
Provide month-end reports to internal and external stakeholders
work.summary: RevaComm Project Managers serve our project teams and help to drive toward the desired outcomes. This covers a wide variety of tasks like strategic program development, proposal writing, opportunity mining, customer coordination, customer service, project management, program and project reporting, program and project marketing, budgeting and time management, as well as other services.

work.description: Dark Wolf Solutions is an IT consultancy firm that offers software development, system engineering and management solutions.
highlights: Enterprise-level Scrum Master
Facilitates task flow across Value Stream Scrum of Scrums
Coaches Scrum Masters on Agile framework execution
Facilitates communication between the teams and Business/Technical Leadership
Coaches Business and Technical leadership teams on Agile philosophies, framework, and culture
Facilitates Business Leadership & Technical Leadership Backlog Grooming
Removes Enterprise wide blockers
Helps map dependencies of all work, across all product teams

work.description: CrossFit is a lifestyle characterized by safe, effective exercise and sound nutrition. CrossFit can be used to accomplish any goal, from improved health to weight loss to better performance.
work.name: Blue Cord CrossFit
work.summary: Lead CrossFit workouts for a wide variety of clients with different goals. Educate clients on proper form, gymnastic and Olympic lifting techniques, injury prevention, mobility, and proper nutrition. Provide specialized training for clients based on personal needs and goals.

work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.summary: Developer and Scrum Master for DevSecOps Platform Engineering team. Initial team goals included replacing costly legacy lab solutions with Lab as a Service (LaaS) solution that provides internal customers with immutable test infrastructure. Success of initial program has ignited interest in developing similar solution beyond development into test and delivery. Work with stakeholders and customers to develop continuous integration platform pipeline using Gitlab CI, HashiCorp Packer, Ansible, and OpenSCAP.

work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.position: Senior Cybersecurity Engineer II / Scrum Master
work.summary: Refactored Group Policy testing and deployment to ensure delivery of versioned security baselines to production systems. Brought system baselines into current Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) recommendations. Successfully migrated team code base to GitLab ensuring accurate change history and version control. Performed additional role as Scrum Master for automation team. Worked as servant-leader to facilitate value delivery and remove developer roadblocks.

work.name: Raytheon Technologies
work.summary: Designed Cybersecurity solutions for the NORAD Integrated Tactical Warning/Attack Assessment and Space Support Contract (NISSC). Developed stand-alone PowerShell based solutions to deploy and verify the mitigation of vulnerabilities in legacy Windows systems. Accelerated deployment of modern Windows systems as a PowerShell Desired State Configuration developer. Worked with customer prioritize legacy system vulnerability remediation while minimizing resources required to meet customer needs.

work.name: Vykin Corporation
work.summary: Work with Vykin's customers to architect Windows-based end-user solutions (e.g. Windows 10 migration), including key success factors, project scope while driving a better understanding of the customer’s environment and potential project risks.  Design and lead product demos, Proof of Concepts and pilot engagements to help drive requirements, success factors and customer confidence in End User Engineer's (EUC) proprietary software solutions.  Work closely with the EUC software development team to communicate requirements and participate in functional design and prioritization of software enhancement/features backlog.   Design and deliver procedures for end user consumption.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Platform PFE for DoD customers working primarily with Navy, MDA, and USMC customers  Specialized in Windows, Server, Active Directory and Virtualization technologies with deep understanding and ability to deliver timely and creative incident resolution focused on root cause analysis, prevention, and subsequent knowledge transfer  Successfully managed Microsoft IaaS resources for major political campaign event resulting in system-wide stability and security.

work.name: CrossFit 7070 LLC
work.summary: Lead CrossFit workouts for a wide variety of clients with different goals. Educate clients on proper form, gymnastic and Olympic lifting techniques, injury prevention, mobility, and proper nutrition. Provide specialized training for clients based on personal needs and goals.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Develop and test Windows images for enterprise deployment  Explore and test new Windows versions and features for inclusion in the enterprise.  Supported SCCM 2012 and 2007 Windows infrastructure.  Engineered, tested, and implemented disaster recovery solution using Hyper-V Replica.  Led team in server deployments during 2012 Distribution Point roll out and process improvement.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Established role in the company as an expert in Group Policy and Active Directory delegation.  Led team in efforts related to PowerShell scripting and automation.  Implemented numerous improvements to standard operating procedures resulting in efficient and standardized processes that reduced workflow bottlenecks.  Developed and performed integration and system tests for Active Directory service upgrades.  Tested ongoing software upgrades and enhancements with a focus on directory service quality and stability.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Support unclassified networks for Air Force and contractors. Maintain smooth operation of computer systems. Duties include active directory and group policy management, SMS and WSUS administration and software deployment, Operating System, and application support.   Worked with Dept. of Defense and USAF programs to evangelize new operating system deployment and testing. Achieved the highest percentage of upgraded systems and test participants among participating sites.  Developed role-based security procedures using administrative and technical controls that stabilized network while enhancing system security.  Consolidated costly legacy systems to VMware.

work.name: Lockheed Martin
work.summary: Resolved technical issues for USAF customers at Schriever AFB. Supported general operating system, networking, hardware, and LOB issues for approximately four thousand clients.  Responsible for advanced troubleshooting of critical issues, while acting as a liaison to the disparate system and product contacts.

work.name: HP
work.summary: Resolved technical issues for Microsoft internal employees, supporting messaging and collaboration tools, as well as remote access.  Authored numerous technical articles for internal solution database resulting in lower call times.  Trained peers into the department to expand support queues and reduce wait times.  Acted as liaison between levels of support staff to ensure the quality of communication.
